quotes.Quotation: There are three types of creators. The first copies from nature, the second copies from his neighbor, and the third uses his imagination.
A limited scientist can't see beyond matter.
A genius must always protect the mind against intruders.
The best way to learn and develop is to observe the stupidy of humanity.
The wise seek the truth, and the fool makes his own.
Everyone can read a book, but not everyone gets the message.
It is better to study for yourselves than to let deceivers educate you.
It's easy to talk freely but harder to stick to a subject.
Languages are born out of confusion and miss pronunciations.
Nothing on this earth lasts forever.
The fool loves to talk a lot and do less.
